item.description:
Chen is a PhD student in UCL Department of Computer Science. His research interests cover Inverse Problems, an area in Mathematics solving for hidden variables given observations & forward models explaining the observations with hidden variables, Bayesian Inference, an area in Statistics modelling data with likelihood functions & prior information as well as exploring the posterior distributions by sophisticated approximations, and Machine Learning which connects solid mathematical and statistical analysis to exciting real world problems. His research is fully funded by UCL Computer Science Departmental Studentship at overseas standard.

Besides being a junior researcher, Chen is also a street photographer. He is invited to be one of the first six UCL photographers for UCL Instagrammer in Residence.
